name: Police Simulator 3D
description:
Try on the role of the policeman! Police Simulator is really breathtaking high pressure game. Play as a policeman and reach the crime locations on time to stop the criminals! Stop the ongoing fights and violent acts! Run as fast as you can. Cross all the hurdles to get to the scene. But be as quick as you can be. In this fun game you have a chance to be the cop. Catch all the thieves, robbers out there. Hurry! The city needs you!















3e58763fd0
